message.body: So, someone just literally stole some bread I had in the CAL freezer. Didn't even bother to tie the bag neatly. So. Rude.
What??! SO rude. Who DOES that??!!
I'm like actually pissed off. Like, that person is either stupid to think I wouldn't notice, or an asshole for not caring if I notice.
Was there any other bread in there? Like maybe they toom from the wrong one? In which case theyre still an idiot, but maybe not an ass?
I dunno, I was on my way out, so I didn't check. But that's a good point.
